welcome_message_title: Welcome to Neuhausen auf den Fildern
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Neuhausen auf den Fildern! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Neuhausen has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Stuttgart Echterdingen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and accepting the terms and conditions.
